A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the WORST Star Wars movie ever produced.  There were two worthwhile scenes in this movie.  The rest was craptastic and made no sense.  I feel sorry for the actors and actresses who suffered through this garbage.  Garbage story. Garbage writing.  Tried watching again on Netflix to see if I was just in a mood or something but no. I couldn't even watch it.  Sad.
